channel.title: Inventory background
channel.description: How do I change the look of inventory background? The message over the Log Out button and other text in tabs... I only know how to change the quest tab texts, but there is no other texts :(

item.title: Inventory background
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

To change the inventory background, change the sprite in the Sprites folder in the client.

Texthandler.java is where you will remove most of the text, the logout tab, I’m sure, is in client.java

Read full topic
